groups.name: jwt
groups.description: JWT token configuration (secret is auto-generated at startup)

properties.name: jwt.access-token-expiration-ms
properties.description: Access token lifetime in milliseconds. Default: 600000 (10 minutes)

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token-expiration-ms
properties.description: Refresh token lifetime in milliseconds. Default: 2592000000 (30 days)
